description: Manage forwarding ruleset with dns resolver.

commands.name: az dns-resolver forwarding-ruleset create
commands.syntax:
az dns-resolver forwarding-ruleset create --dns-forwarding-ruleset-name
                                          --outbound-endpoints
                                          --resource-group
                                          [--if-match]
                                          [--if-none-match]
                                          [--location]
                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--tags]

commands.name: az dns-resolver forwarding-ruleset delete
commands.summary: Deletes a DNS forwarding ruleset. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone. All forwarding rules within the ruleset will be deleted.
commands.syntax:
az dns-resolver forwarding-ruleset delete [--dns-forwarding-ruleset-name]
                                          [--ids]
                                          [--if-match]
                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--resource-group]
                                          [--subscription]
                                          [--yes]

commands.name: az dns-resolver forwarding-ruleset list
commands.summary: Lists DNS forwarding ruleset resource IDs attached to a virtual network. And Lists DNS forwarding rulesets within a resource group. And Lists DNS forwarding rulesets in all resource groups of a subscription.

commands.name: az dns-resolver forwarding-ruleset list-by-virtual-network
commands.summary: Lists DNS forwarding ruleset resource IDs attached to a virtual network.

commands.name: az dns-resolver forwarding-ruleset show
commands.summary: Gets a DNS forwarding ruleset properties.

commands.name: az dns-resolver forwarding-ruleset update
commands.syntax:
az dns-resolver forwarding-ruleset update [--add]
                                          [--dns-forwarding-ruleset-name]
                                          [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--ids]
                                          [--if-match]
                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--remove]
                                          [--resource-group]
                                          [--set]
                                          [--subscription]
                                          [--tags]

commands.name: az dns-resolver forwarding-ruleset wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
